@Electrical_field_2D/projections.m

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 % =====================================================================
00002 %> @brief projections calculates capacitances to be measured with phantom
00003 %>
00004 %> @param error_V capacitance error amplitude e.g. error_V = 0.001 - 1 mV or 'none'
00005 %> @param range_V capacitance error range e.g. range_V = 10 - 10 V or 'none' 
00006 %>
00007 %> @retval out return value of this method
00008 % =====================================================================
00009 function [C] = projections(ef_obj,error_V,range_V) 
00010 
00011 disp 'projections (capacitances) - calculating';
00012 
00013 S   = ef_obj.S;
00014 
00015 % Compute capacitance only in FOV
00016 
00017 point_list=ef_obj.permittivity_distribution.fov_indicies_vector;
00018 
00019 % alloc
00020 Perm_FOV=ones(1,numel(point_list));
00021 
00022 Perm_FOV=ef_obj.discretization_grid_sensor_and_phantom.value_list(point_list);
00023 Eps=Perm_FOV;
00024 
00025 S_tmp=ones(ef_obj.sens_matrix_num,numel(point_list));
00026 
00027 S_tmp=S(:,point_list);
00028 S=S_tmp;
00029 
00030 C = S*(Eps');
00031 
00032 if ~strcmp(error_V,'none')&& ~strcmp(range_V,'none')
00033     rand('twister', sum(100*clock));
00034     C = C + error_V/range_V * ( max(C)-min(C))*rand(ef_obj.measurement_count,1);
00035 end
00036 
00037 disp 'projections (capacitances). done.';
